clang-tidy-regex.Description: Add this regex to clang-tidy to filter which files it should process

perform-all-clang-tidy-checks.Description: Enable this to enable the second pass of clang-tidy checks.

intermediate-dir.Description: Specify the folder name in the build intermediate folder. This intermediate folder sits directly under the build intermediate folder (.rex/build)

enable-unit-tests.Description: Enable generation of unit test projects

enable-code-coverage.Description: Enable code coverage when the code gets build. This is only supported for Clang compiler

enable-address-sanitizer.Description: Enable address sanitizer when code gets build. This is only supported for Clang compiler

enable-ub-sanitizer.Description: Enable undefined behavior sanitizer when code gets build. This is only supported for Clang compiler

enable-fuzzy-testing.Description: Enable generation of fuzzy test projects

enable-auto-tests.Description: Enable generation of auto test projects

graphics-api.Description: Specify the graphics API to use. DX12 is the default.

IDE.Description: Select which IDE to use. Visual Studio is the default.

disable-clang-tidy-for-thirdparty.Description: Disable clang-tidy usage on third-party projects
